overview:
I am Chief Revenue Officer at Looksmart, one of the largest pay-per-click (PPC) search advertising networks, processing billions of queries per day. We serve keyword-based text ads on our targeted network of high quality publisher sites. We support direct relationships with thousands of diverse paid search advertisers, and our expertise is grounded in connecting these advertisers with high quality traffic via our award winning, best-in-class AdCenter platform.

I am also a domain expert on platform technology, with an emphasis on digital advertising workflow, data management, and real-time bidding. I have led successful sales efforts at TRAFFIQ, Reviewed.com, Nielsen, and Mediabistro.com.

I am a member of American Business Media’s speakers bureau, the IAB’s Networks and Exchanges and Sales Executive Committees, and a contributor to industry publications including Business Insider, eMarketing & Commerce, eConsultancy, AdMonsters, MediaPost, The Agency Post, Adotas, ClickZ, iMediaConnection, DigiDay, and AdWeek.

My latest whitepaper is Best Practices in Digital Display Media (eConsultancy, March 2012).
